SUMMARY: NESTED | FIELD | CONSTR | METHOD DETAIL: FIELD | CONSTR | METHOD

com.esri.mo2.data.feat
Interface SpatialFilter

All Superinterfaces:
Cloneable, QueryFilter
All Known Subinterfaces:
MapFilter
All Known Implementing Classes:
BaseMapFilter, BaseSpatialFilter
public interface SpatialFilter
extends QueryFilter

Defines a spatial selection condition that can be added to a Query. Currently, only one Spatial Filter is used. In the future, multiple Spatial Filters can be added to a Query, in which case thay can be considered to be connected by a logical and.

See Also:
QueryFilter

Field Detail

ENVELOPE_INTERSECTION

public static final int ENVELOPE_INTERSECTION
Spatial relation type, indicating a requirement that a spatial search only return Features whose envelope overlaps the SpatialFilter's geometry. This test simply compares envelopes and is not computationally intensive.

See Also:
NOT_ENVELOPE_INTERSECTION, Constant Field Values

AREA_INTERSECTION

public static final int AREA_INTERSECTION
Spatial relation type, indicating a requirement that a spatial search only return Features that are not disjoint from the SpatialFilter's geometry. This is a more rigorous constraint compared with ENVELOPE_INTERSECTION

See Also:
NOT_AREA_INTERSECTION, NOT_DISJOINT_FILTER, Constant Field Values

NOT_ENVELOPE_INTERSECTION

public static final int NOT_ENVELOPE_INTERSECTION
Spatial relation type, indicating a requirement that a spatial search only return Features whose envelope do not overlap the SpatialFilter's geometry.

See Also:
NOT_ENVELOPE_INTERSECTION, Constant Field Values

NOT_AREA_INTERSECTION

public static final int NOT_AREA_INTERSECTION
Spatial relation type, indicating a requirement that a spatial search only return Features that are disjoint from the SpatialFilter's geometry. This is a more rigorous constraint compared with ENVELOPE_INTERSECTION

See Also:
AREA_INTERSECTION, DISJOINT_FILTER, Constant Field Values

INSIDE_FILTER

public static final int INSIDE_FILTER
Spatial relation type, indicating a requirement that a spatial search only return Features that are inside the SpatialFilter's geometry.

See Also:
NOT_INSIDE_FILTER, CONTAIN_FILTER, Constant Field Values

CONTAIN_FILTER

public static final int CONTAIN_FILTER
Spatial relation type, indicating a requirement that a spatial search only return Features that contain the SpatialFilter's geometry.

NOT_CONTAIN_FILTER, INSIDE_FILTER, Constant Field Values

NOT_OVERLAP_FILTER, CROSS_FILTER, Constant Field Values

DISJOINT_FILTER

public static final int DISJOINT_FILTER
Spatial relation type, indicating a requirement that a spatial search only return Features that are disjoint from the SpatialFilter's geometry.

See Also:
NOT_DISJOINT_FILTER, NOT_AREA_INTERSECTION, Constant Field Values

CROSS_FILTER

public static final int CROSS_FILTER
Spatial relation type, indicating a requirement that a spatial search only return Features that cross (in the Clementini sense) the SpatialFilter's geometry.

See Also:
NOT_CROSS_FILTER, OVERLAP_FILTER, Constant Field Values

TOUCH_FILTER

public static final int TOUCH_FILTER
Spatial relation type, indicating a requirement that a spatial search only return Features that touch (in the Clementini sense) the SpatialFilter's geometry.

See Also:
NOT_TOUCH_FILTER, Constant Field Values

EQUAL_FILTER

public static final int EQUAL_FILTER
Spatial relation type, indicating a requirement that a spatial search only return Features that are equivalent to the SpatialFilter's geometry. This means the filter's geometry is inside the feature and at the same time contains the feature.

See Also:
NOT_EQUAL_FILTER, Constant Field Values

NOT_INSIDE_FILTER

public static final int NOT_INSIDE_FILTER
Spatial relation type, indicating a requirement that a spatial search only return Features that are not inside the SpatialFilter's geometry.

See Also:
INSIDE_FILTER, NOT_CONTAIN_FILTER, Constant Field Values

public static final int NOT_CONTAIN_FILTER
Spatial relation type, indicating a requirement that a spatial search only return Features that contain the SpatialFilter's geometry.

NOT_TOUCH_FILTER

public static final int NOT_TOUCH_FILTER

See Also:
TOUCH_FILTER, Constant Field Values

NOT_EQUAL_FILTER

public static final int NOT_EQUAL_FILTER
Spatial relation type, indicating a requirement that a spatial search only return Features that are not equivalent to the SpatialFilter's geometry. This means the filter's geometry is inside the feature and at the same time contains the feature.

See Also:
EQUAL_FILTER, Constant Field Values
